name: Barbeque Chicken Paninis
author: Casey Rawson
summary: Quick, easy, and tasty! We have had these with a variety of substitutions - ham or capicola instead of bacon, different cheese types, and a variety of barbeque sauces - but this combination is our favorite.
ingredients: 1 (2 pound) rotisserie chicken, boned and shredded
directions: Preheat a panini press to medium-high heat and lightly oil the surface
Layer shredded chicken, 1 slice Cheddar cheese, 4 half-slices of bacon, and barbeque sauce on the bottom of each Kaiser roll
Top with the other half of each roll
Grill sandwiches in the prepared panini press until cheese is melted and rolls are golden-brown, about 5 minutes
